Of the state of the church in future ages, or, An inspection into the divine prophecies touching the state of the church, in the latter ages of the world / by W.A. Allen, William, d. 1686.
[28], 388 p.
Printed for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1684.
Errata: prelim. p. [25]. Attributed to William Allen. Cf. McAlpin Coll., Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.), Wing. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
